columns.Fname: The first name of the employee.
columns.Minit: The middle initial of the employee.
columns.Lname: The last name of the employee.
columns.Ssn: The unique identifier for the employee.
columns.Bdate: The birth date of the employee.
columns.Address: The residential address of the employee.
columns.Sex: The gender of the employee, represented by a single character.
columns.Salary: The annual salary of the employee.
columns.Super_ssn: The SSN of the employee's supervisor.
columns.Dno: The department number where the employee works.

employee.table_description: The overall description of the table is to manage employee records.

columns.Dnumber: The unique identifier for the department.
columns.Mgr_ssn: The SSN of the department manager.
columns.Mgr_start_date: The start date of the manager's tenure.

department.table_description: The overall description of the table is to manage department details.

columns.Pnumber: The unique identifier for the project.
columns.Plocation: The location where the project is based.
columns.Dnum: The department number associated with the project.

project.table_description: The overall description of the table is to manage project information.

columns.Essn: The unique identifier of the employee to whom the dependent belongs.
columns.Dependent_name: The name of the dependent related to the employee.
columns.Sex: The gender of the dependent, represented by a single character.
columns.Bdate: The birth date of the dependent.
columns.Relationship: The relationship of the dependent to the employee.

dependent.table_description: The overall description of the table is to manage dependent records.

columns.Essn: The unique identifier of the employee working on the project.
columns.Pno: The unique identifier of the project being worked on.
columns.Hours: The number of hours the employee has worked on the project.

works_on.table_description: The overall description of the table is to manage employee-project assignments.

columns.Dnumber: The unique identifier for the department.

dept_locations.table_description: The overall description of the table is to manage department locations.
